## FieldDropdown.doValueUpdate\_() method

Update the value of this dropdown field.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected doValueUpdate_(newValue: any): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  newValue | any | The value to be saved. The default validator guarantees that this is one of the valid dropdown options. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
